title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a user can successfully register using valid credentials and required fields are saved properly.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-up page.
Enter valid username, email, and strong password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify that the registration is successful and user receives confirmation.
Confirm that the user data is saved correctly in the system.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check that a registered user can log in successfully with correct username/email and password.

steps.description: Go to the login page.
Enter valid registered username/email and password.
Click on login button.
Confirm user is redirected to the dashboard.
Verify the user session is established and role-based access is applied.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Verify login failure and error message display when incorrect password is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username/email with incorrect password.
Click login button.
Check that login fails and appropriate error message is displayed.

title: Beat Store Search and Filtering Functionality
description: Validate that the beat catalog can be searched and filtered using different criteria and results update accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Beat Store page.
Enter a search term in the search bar.
Apply various filters such as genre, mood, BPM, and price.
Verify the beats displayed match search criteria and filters.
Confirm no unrelated beats appear in the results.

title: Audio Preview Playback with Waveform Player
description: Ensure audio previews on beat cards and global players play correctly, and playback controls respond instantly.

steps.description: Browse beats and select various beats with waveform players.
Click play on each audio preview.
Confirm audio plays with low latency.
Use pause, seek, and volume controls.
Verify controls function correctly and update UI accordingly.

title: Add Beats to Cart with License Selection
description: Verify users can add selected beats to cart and choose license types for each beat before proceeding to checkout.

steps.description: Browse the beat catalog and select a beat.
Choose the desired license type (e.g., basic, artist, ultimate).
Add the beat with the selected license to the shopping cart.
Confirm the cart displays the beat with correct license and price.

title: Checkout Flow with Clerk Billing Integration
description: Test the checkout process from cart to payment completion using Clerk Billing, verifying order creation and payment success.

steps.description: Go to the shopping cart with valid items.
Proceed to checkout.
Enter valid payment and billing details.
Confirm purchase and submit payment.
Verify payment success notification and order confirmation.
Confirm order is recorded and visible in the user’s order history.

title: Subscription Management: Upgrade, Downgrade, Cancel
description: Verify subscription plan changes (Basic, Artist, Ultimate) and cancellation are handled properly with billing updates.

steps.description: Navigate to the subscription management page on the user dashboard.
Upgrade the current subscription plan.
Confirm billing reflects the upgrade and subscription plan is updated.
Downgrade the subscription plan to a lower tier.
Verify billing adjusts accordingly and plan updates.
Cancel the active subscription.
Ensure subscription status is shown as canceled and billing stops appropriately.

title: User Dashboard Data Accuracy
description: Confirm user dashboard displays accurate analytics, download history, order overview, and subscription status.

steps.description: Log in as a registered user with existing orders and subscriptions.
Navigate to the dashboard page.
Verify download history shows correct files and dates.
Ensure order management displays complete and recent orders with statuses.
Check analytics cards for correct statistics.
Confirm subscription status and details are correctly shown.

title: Service Reservation Booking
description: Test the service reservation system by booking mixing, mastering, and recording sessions with calendar integration.

steps.description: Access the reservation form from the dashboard.
Select a service type (mixing, mastering, recording).
Choose a valid date and time slot using the integrated calendar.
Provide required session details and submit the booking.
Confirm booking is accepted and visible in reservation history.

title: File Upload with Quota Enforcement
description: Verify secure file upload via the File Management system and enforcement of user storage quotas.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the file upload section.
Upload a file within the allowed quota limit.
Check that the file uploads successfully and appears in user file list.
Attempt to upload a file exceeding quota limits.
Verify upload is rejected and a quota exceeded error message is shown.

title: File Download Security and Access Control
description: Ensure only authorized users can download their files and no unauthorized access is permitted.

steps.description: Login as a user with uploaded files.
Attempt to download own files.
Validate successful and secure download of user files.
Attempt to access or download files belonging to another user.
Confirm access is denied and proper error message is shown.

title: Internationalization and Language Switching
description: Verify that the user interface supports English and French languages and language can be switched dynamically.

steps.description: Load the application default in English.
Check that all UI components display text in English.
Use the language switcher control to change language to French.
Confirm all UI texts update and display correctly in French.
Switch back to English and verify UI text reverts.

title: Accessibility Compliance Testing
description: Confirm that the platform UI adheres to WCAG 2.1 AA standards including keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and color contrast compliance.

steps.description: Navigate through all major UI components entirely using keyboard.
Verify clear focus indicators and logical tab order.
Test navigation and element reading using screen reader software.
Confirm all interactive elements are readable and announced properly.
Check color contrast ratios meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards across all UI elements.

title: Responsive Design and Cross-Browser Compatibility
description: Verify UI responsiveness across mobile, tablet, desktop, large desktop, and ultrawide viewports and validate consistency on Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers.

steps.description: Open the application on different devices/emulators with varying screen sizes.
Confirm UI components adapt correctly without layout breakage.
Access the application in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers.
Verify consistent styling, functionality, and performance across all browsers.

title: Security: Verify Protection of Authentication and Payment Flows
description: Test that authentication credentials and payment information are securely processed and protected from common vulnerabilities.

steps.description: Attempt SQL injection and XSS attacks on login and payment forms.
Confirm input validation prevents injection attacks.
Inspect data transmission during login and payment for encryption (e.g., via HTTPS).
Verify credentials and payment data are encrypted and not exposed.
Check session management and token handling for security best practices.
Confirm no session hijacking or token leakage vulnerabilities exist.

title: Handle Invalid Payment Details During Checkout
description: Verify the system properly handles invalid payment inputs or declined transactions with clear error messages.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout with an invalid credit card number.
Submit the payment form.
Validate the payment is declined and user sees a meaningful error message.
Try payment with expired card or insufficient funds.
Confirm system handles failures gracefully without crashes.

title: Order Management Synchronization with WooCommerce
description: Validate orders placed on the platform synchronize correctly with WooCommerce backend and order statuses update accordingly.

steps.description: Create a new order via the platform checkout process.
Verify the order is created in WooCommerce backend with matching details.
Update order status in WooCommerce.
Confirm the updated status reflects back in the user’s order history on the platform.

title: State Management Consistency Using Zustand and TanStack Query
description: Ensure that central state management handles data correctly across components and updates are reflected in UI without inconsistency.

steps.description: Trigger data queries and mutations in various components (e.g., beat selection, cart updates, subscription changes).
Verify UI components display consistent state reflecting the latest data.
Simulate race conditions by triggering multiple requests rapidly.
Confirm no stale or conflicting data appears in the UI.

title: Performance: Page Load and Interaction Timing
description: Measure critical performance metrics like First Contentful Paint, Time to Interactive, and frame rate to ensure the platform meets performance targets.

steps.description: Load homepage and major feature pages (Store, Dashboard, Checkout) on a standard broadband connection.
Verify First Contentful Paint is under 2 seconds.
Confirm Time to Interactive is under 3 seconds.
Interact with UI components like audio players and filters.
Confirm UI interactions are smooth with 60fps frame rate.

title: Visual Regression Testing Across UI Components
description: Verify no unintended UI changes or layout shifts occur during updates by comparing visual snapshots across releases.

steps.description: Capture baseline screenshots of all key UI components on multiple viewport sizes.
Run visual regression tests after code changes or deployments.
Check for unexpected visual differences and confirm all UI elements are consistent.
